input.sentences: the expert was brought in the talk to the kids
he had lots of good ideas that could be used in their lives .
the kids could ask questions to help them out .
after that the expert spoke to others in the room and gave his opnion .
they made a video so that it could be shown to others .
output.sentences: The kids in the club listened intently to the invited speaker
They were surprised to find  him to be interesting, inspiring and engaging.
Maybe someday if they worked hard and applied themselves they would be as successful as he.
When the talk was over the speaker mingled in the crowd and answered some of their questions.
He was receptive and interested in their ideas as well.
